mean_cn: n. 心理学家，心理学者
mean_en: a scientist who specializes in the study and treatment of the mind and behavior :a specialist in psychology
word_etyma: psych灵魂+o+logist...学家→心理学家，心理学者
short_phrase: A psychologist analyzes the sad woman.
sentence: Talking to a psychologist helped her with her anxiety problems.
sentence_trans: 同心理学家的交谈帮助她缓解了焦虑问题。
